channel.title: Pages on James Horton
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on James Horton

item.title: About
item.description: So I’m an Electronic Engineer, who now spends most of his time doing DSP and Signal processing at work. I spend a lot of time working with MATLAB and Simulink in my day job as a “Systems Engineer” for a defence company. Outside of work you will find my experimenting with Software Defined Radio (SDR), open source FPGA boards, and 3D Printing. I studied Electronic Engineering at University of Surrey in Guildford, and graduated in 2013.
